alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 5:57PM PST until November 08 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
